## Image material on open license (including NC)

(images are shown in small size, but high resolution, metadata indicated below)

```{r, echo=FALSE}

d1 <- list.files("../static/material", recursive =TRUE, pattern = ".png")
d2 <- list.files("../static/material", recursive =TRUE, pattern = ".jpg")
all = c(d1,d2)

Metad= read.csv("../static/material/material_metadata.csv")

d= Metad$image[Metad$Include_page == 1]

B<- paste0 ("![../material/",d,"](../material/",d,"){width=80%, height=200}" , collapse = "\n")

```



`r B`

## videos listed via googlesheet 

(https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ybqL2WNdJZb7nwEAJ6yWJ0W95D3CtyEkQ97DFcJydsk/edit?usp=sharing)

```{r, echo= FALSE}
Metad1= read.csv("../static/material/ggsheet_list.csv")
Metad1$Link = 
  paste0 ('<a href="',Metad1$Link,'" target="_blank">',Metad1$Link,"</a>")
Metad1$duration..mm.ss. = format(Metad1$duration..mm.ss. , format = "%M:%S")
#DT:::DT2BSClass(c('compact', 'cell-border'))
dt = DT::datatable(
  Metad1,
  escape = c(-2),
  
  extensions = list('FixedColumns',
                    'Scroller'),
  
  options = list(
    deferRender = TRUE,
    scrollY = 400,
    scroller = TRUE
    ,
    dom = 't',
    scrollX = TRUE,
    pageLength = -1,
    fixedColumns = TRUE
  )
)
widgetframe::frameWidget(dt, width = '95%')
```
